meaningMnemonic: It is <kanji>correct</kanji> and you're <kanji>certain</kanji> of it. When you've done this much checking and you're this sure, your measurements must be very <vocabulary>accurate</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>precise</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
